entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022
